data.title: Neethane Enthan Ponvasantham TV Serial
data.meta_description: Watch Neethane Enthan Ponvasantham Latest Episodes Online in full HD on ZEE5. Enjoy Neethane Enthan Ponvasantham best trending moments, video clips, promos, best scenes, previews & more of Neethane Enthan Ponvasantham in HD on ZEE5.
data.text:
About Neethane Enthan Ponvasantham TV Show

Neethane Enthan Ponvasantham is a Tamil drama TV show that revolves around Anu and Surya, who unexpectedly meet each other and begin a complicated relationship. The show follows the journey of their love as they face obstacles and fight to remain together. Neethane Enthan Ponvasantham TV show comprises 509 episodes with an approximate duration of 20 minutes per episode.

Release Date of Neethane Enthan Ponvasantham TV Show

The Tamil romantic TV show Neethane Enthan Ponvasantham was released on 24th February, 2020 on the ZEE5 OTT platform.

Plot of Neethane Enthan Ponvasantham TV Show

The story of this Tamil TV show begins with Anu, a simple, middle-class girl, who meets Surya, a rich businessman. They first meet in an auto rickshaw and soon become friends. As their friendship blossoms, Anu's parents decide to fix her marriage with some other man, and Surya tries to handle the situation. But Anu reluctantly agrees to comply with her parents’ wishes, and Surya decides to maintain a distance. However, there is some misunderstanding, and Surya and Anu get the opportunity to confess their love to each other and the two travel to Bangalore. Just when everything seems to be going smoothly, Surya's former business partner, Surendhar, is released from prison and vows to destroy Surya. Will Surya and Anu be able to overcome this challenge and get married?

Neethane Enthan Ponvasantham TV Show Cast and Crew

Cast - Character

Dharshana Ashokan - Anu Suryaprakash

Jai Akash - Surya Prakash

Subiksha Kayarohanam - Mansi

Nivashini Divya - Meera

Karthik Sasidharan - Chandraprakash

Raja Vetri Prabhu - Dheena

Rishmitha - Ramya

Sonia - Pushpa

Sathyapriya - Sharadha

David Solomon Raja - Pankaj

Raj Mithran - Raghupathy

Crew

Director – L. Muthukumarasamy

Producer – Xavier Britto

Co-producer – Nivashini Divya

Writer – Haran Prasanna

Editor – M. D. Prabakaran

Cinematographer – V. Sams Williyappan

Did You Know?

1. Dharshana Asokan, who has won over fans as the charming middle-class girl Anu, is a doctor by profession. She excelled at school, just like she did in her on-screen portrayals.

2. This romantic TV show is an official remake of the Marathi show “Tula Pahate Re”.

3. Jai Akash, who portrays Surya Prakash in this show, is a British citizen. Before transitioning to television with Neethane Enthan Ponvasantham, he has appeared in over 30 Telugu, Tamil, and Kannada films.

FAQs about Neethane Enthan Ponvasantham TV Show

Q1. Who is the theme music composer for Neethane Enthan Ponvasantham?

Vishal Chandrasekhar wrote and composed the well-known romantic songs of this series.

Q2. How many seasons does Neethane Enthan Ponvasantham TV show comprise?

This drama TV show comprises only one season.

Karthika Deepam
